title: Computer Kakumei: Saikyou x Saisoku no Zunou Tanjou
original_name: コンピューター革命 最強 × 最速の頭脳誕生
sinopse: The anime short Computer Kakumei was aired by the Japanese public broadcaster NHK as part of a TV special. The near-future anime was conceived by Parasite Eve author Hideaki Sena, and it depicts how ubiquitous computers have transformed life's various aspects in 2020 Tokyo. The story is told through the eyes of a high school senior named Mako.
